Eric Schmidt gave similar comments in a blog post today, saying that, as Google had grown, managing the business had become "more complicated" and the trio had been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making . Vint Cerf said Eric Schmidt , 55, had been chief executive for 10 years- "a nice round number" - and Larry Page , now 37, was ready to lead the company into the future.
